description: Try our easy to follow Cherry Chia Jam Biscuits recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Biscuit,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Sesame free,Cherry,Christmas,Soy free,Vegetarian,Shortbread,Peanut free
name: Cherry Chia Jam Biscuits Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: To make the jam, place cherries, maple syrup and lemon juice in a medium saucepan over medium-high heat. Simmer for 15 minutes, stirring occasionally, or until cherries are very soft. Remove from heat and mash or purée with a stick blender. Stir in chia seeds and set aside for 15 minutes to cool and thicken.

Meanwhile, use an electric mixer to beat butter and icing sugar together in a large bowl until pale and creamy. Beat in egg and vanilla until smooth. Sift flours and baking powder together and stir into butter mixture.

Preheat oven to 160°C. Line 2 baking trays with baking paper. Roll dough to 4mm thick. Using a 4.5cm scalloped cutter, cut out biscuits and place on trays. Using a small 2cm star cutter, cut stars from centres of half the biscuits.
Bake biscuits for 15 minutes or until pale golden. Cool completely on wire racks.
Spread each whole biscuit with 1 tsp jam and sandwich together with a star biscuit. Dust with extra icing sugar to serve.
